trans-unit.source: Identifies a type as an object suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將型別識別為適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to identify an object as suitable for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>屬性來識別該物件為適合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。

trans-unit.source: Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to present suitable objects to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 設計階段之類的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>類別使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>屬性來呈現適當的物件，將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to indicate an object is suitable for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>屬性來指出物件是適用於繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `NorthwindData` object is intended for use with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`NorthwindData`物件適用於搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to `true` when you use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定為`true`當您使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> class and indicates whether an object is suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指出物件是否適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor to indicate to a design-time class such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class that an object should be excluded from the list of suitable objects for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>建構函式，例如表示設計階段類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>類別的物件應該從適用於繫結至物件的清單中排除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to the value of the `isDataObject` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定的值為`isDataObject`參數。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示類別在設計階段適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.DataObject> field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.DataObject>欄位會傳回新<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Represents the default value of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> class, which indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> 類別的預設值，表示類別在設計階段適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.Default> field defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> class initialized with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.Default>欄位定義的執行個體<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>類別初始化與<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> 執行個體相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this instance of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> fits the pattern of another object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute" /> 的執行個體是否符合另一個物件的模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體與 <paramref name="obj" /> 參數所指定的執行個體相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether this instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會決定是否此執行個體<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>符合另一個物件的模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an object should be considered suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出物件在設計階段是否應被視為適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object should be considered suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件應被視為適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前屬性值是否為屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性目前的值是預設值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the class is not suitable for binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示類別在設計階段不適合繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.NonDataObject> field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.NonDataObject>欄位會傳回新<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A>屬性設定為`false`。
